name: The Dead Village
description:
Your vacation on this small, isolated village was going great, until suddenly every inhabitant of the village turned into a horrible monster while you were asleep, and the village gate was closed. Collect all the keys to open it and escape this dreadful village!

This game was made in 2.5 hours

SOUND CREDITS -
